R

Rebels - Interface in dataBase
 
Rebelsclass - Class in dataBase
 
Rebelsclass(String, int, int) - Constructor for class dataBase.Rebelsclass
variable name will have the same string as the param name; variable xPos will have the same value as the param xPos; variable yPos will have the same value as the param yPos; sign has the standard character "R"; the standard number of points is zero; theForce will start with a -1 value, so then the method forceAwakens() will correctly define the variable; the standard string to state is ACTIVE; trooper and coor will have the DEFAULT size; the standard value of countcaptured is zero; the standard value of coorCount is zero; the first coordinates will be the initial position (xPos,yPos);
RebelWars - Interface in dataBase
 
RebelWarsclass - Class in dataBase
 
RebelWarsclass() - Constructor for class dataBase.RebelWarsclass
creates a new map, array of rebels and stormtroopers; it will set the value of yodaCount to zero; it will set the value of countSith to zero; it will set the value of Scount to one; it will set the value of yodaCount to zero; battleState will start as "SETUP"; start will be "false"; the standard number of rounds will be zero; the standard number of totalGuns will be zero;
reset() - Method in interface dataBase.RebelWars
it will put every variable ou array to its default value, so then the user can start the game again;
reset() - Method in class dataBase.RebelWarsclass
 
rogueOne(char[][], int, int) - Method in interface dataBase.RebelWars
it will create the array of objects, called map through the param array; it will also goes through the array map, to see if there are stormtrooper; if there are they will be added to the stromtrooper's array; finally it will goes through the param array to count how many weapons there are in the whole map;
rogueOne(char[][], int, int) - Method in class dataBase.RebelWarsclass
 
rowPos - Variable in class dataBase.mapObjectclass
the rowPos will be the row position in the map; the colPos will be the column position in the map;
